description: This file is the main entry point of a Flutter application that initializes and runs a calendar app called 'Ocean Calendar'. It sets up routing, theme, and state management with Provider, and defines the root widget of the app.

classes.name: CalendarApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter calendar application, setting up theme, routing, and state management.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes the calendar app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the root CalendarApp, setting up providers and routing.
